channel.title: Item limit? [pi]
channel.description:
I have no idea how to fix this in any single way lmao.
I have been trying to add new items to my server for a while now and it was coming along pretty well, until i added items over a certain ID. Items up to 20084 are fine when added to itemDef and item.cfg work fine and dandy :). when i hit 20085 is where i have a problem.
The items when wielded keep there hold emote but do not have the correct image of weilding.
eg
item 20085 - abbysal vine whip
i have the vine whip equipped i put on a chaotic maul the items swap fine i click the vine whip again the hold emote of the whip is there but it keeps the image of the chaotic maul.
I can see no way around this. In config.java (server sided) there was this
[code] public static final int ITEM_LIMIT = 20500; [/code]
i have tried changing it to numerous numbers and it still has no effect.
ANY help would be appreciated, i really need this fixed lol.
if you need to know i'm using insidiaX if that helps At all.

item.title: Item limit? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:

I have no idea how to fix this in any single way lmao.

i click the vine whip again
the hold emote of the whip is there but it keeps the image of the chaotic maul.

I can see no way around this. In config.java (server sided) there was this

public static final int ITEM_LIMIT = 20500;

i have tried changing it to numerous numbers and it still has no effect.

ANY help would be appreciated, i really need this fixed lol.

if you need to know iâ€™m using insidiaX if that helps At all.
